metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9860 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Botan 1.11.32 through 2.x before 2.6.0. An off-by-one error when processing malformed TLS-CBC ciphertext could cause the receiving side to include in the HMAC computation exactly 64K bytes of data following the record buffer, aka an over-read. The MAC comparison will subsequently fail and the connection will be closed. This could be used for denial of service. No information leak occurs.

criterions.comment: botan1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
